name: Columbia Ventures
overview: Columbia Ventures (CVC) is a private investment company focused principally on the international telecommunications industry. The firm has a distinct ability to foresee business opportunities and accelerate the process to develop them. Columbia Ventures takes a hands-on approach to its companies: it joins the role of investor with manager to infuse both financial and intellectual capital into its management and operations processes. Columbia Ventures provides its businesses knowledgable management, financial discipline, entrepreneurial energy, and a challenge to conventional business practices in order to create sustainable value. All Columbia Ventures operating companies demonstrate entrepreneurial management, financial discipline and creative business practices while benefiting from CVC’s extensive resources for growth and intellectual capital.
